attributes.action: Uphold the democratic choice of the UK electorate to leave the European Union.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, demand that HM Government upholds the lawful and democratic choice of the UK electorate to leave the EU as per the pre-agreed terms of the referendum held on 23rd June 2016. Any petition to the contrary must be openly disregarded as an attempt to undermine democracy.

rejection.details:
If you want the Government to refuse to hold a second referendum on British membership of the European Union, you could sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134345
